https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/A6lD6Rnexw3TeyuPNYKgzbJUF2f.jpg Pietramezzana, a remote village in the Lucan Dolomites, is likely to disappear. Its inhabitants, led by the volcanic Dominic do not give up and, believing that the opening of a factory may be the solution to all their troubles, they want to make sure that the project is successful ... An Almost Perfect Country
